ROOT.sql:query:
SELECT '' AS FORM_ID, '' AS FORM_NAME, PI_SUBJECT, PI_NAME, isnull(PI_DSCR, '') PI_DSCR, PI_INITIATOR_NAME, PI_INITIATOR_ID, PI_ID, PI_STATE, PI_PPI_ID, PI_PI_ID, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),PI_STARTED,120) AS PI_STARTED, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),PI_FINISHED,120) AS PI_FINISHED, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),PI_DELETED,120) AS PI_DELETED, PI_PRIORITY, PF_ID, PF_SUB_KIND, PF_PERFORMER_ID, PF_PERFORMER_NAME, WI_PERFORMER_ID, WI_PERFORMER_NAME, WI_DEPUTY_ID, WI_DEPUTY_NAME, WI_STATE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),WI_CREATED,120) AS WI_CREATED, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),WI_FINISHED,120) AS WI_FINISHED, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),WI_DELETED,120) AS WI_DELETED, WI_ID, WI_NAME, isnull(PI_INITIATOR_UNIT_ID, '') PI_INITIATOR_UNIT_ID, isnull(PI_INITIATOR_UNIT_NAME, '') PI_INITIATOR_UNIT_NAME, PI_BUSINESS_STATE, isnull(CASE PI_BUSINESS_DATA1 WHEN 'b1' THEN '' ELSE PI_BUSINESS_DATA1 END, '') AS PI_BUSINESS_DATA1, isnull(PI_BUSINESS_DATA2, '') PI_BUSINESS_DATA2, CASE @MODE WHEN 'APPROVAL' THEN 'APPROVAL' WHEN 'PROCESS' THEN 'PROCESS' ELSE 'COMPLETE' END AS MODE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), CASE @MODE WHEN 'APPROVAL' THEN WI_CREATED WHEN 'PROCESS' THEN WI_FINISHED ELSE PI_FINISHED END, 120) AS WORKDT
FROM WF_WORKITEM_LIST (NOLOCK) WHERE WI_STATE = '528' AND PI_STATE = '528' AND PF_STATE = '1' AND WI_DELETED IS NULL AND ( PF_SUB_KIND IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006') ) AND PI_BUSINESS_STATE LIKE '02_02%' AND ( PI_SUBJECT LIKE '%'+@PI_NAME+'%' OR @PI_NAME IS NULL ) AND ( PI_INITIATOR_NAME LIKE @PI_INITIATOR_NAME+'%' OR @PI_INITIATOR_NAME IS NULL ) ORDER BY PI_FINISHED DESC FOR XML AUTO
